sentence: This time period starts when the consumer begins to experience financial difficulty.
paraphrased: This time frame begins when the customer first encounters financial difficulties.

sentence: By increasing crop yields, we help limit the conversion of carbonsequestering forests into farmland.
paraphrased: We reduce the conversion of carbon-sequestering forests into cropland by boosting crop yields.

sentence: The repurchase right lapses as to approximately 834 shares per month.
paraphrased: Every month, the buyback right expires with regard to about 834 shares.

sentence: Rules of conduct will be provided to you at the annual meeting of stockholders.
paraphrased: You will get the rules of behavior at the annual stockholders meeting.

sentence: UDR made no political contributions to candidates in 2020.
paraphrased: In the 2020 election, UDR did not support any candidates financially.

sentence: Huntington has earned a reputation for strong community involvement and innovative civic leadership.
paraphrased: Huntington is known for its active civic participation and creative civic leadership.

sentence: A key issue in maintaining that trust is data privacy and security.
paraphrased: Data security and privacy are a crucial concern in upholding that trust.

sentence: At peak construction and fabrication, FGP-WPMP will generate around 20,000 jobs.
paraphrased: Around 20,000 jobs will be created by FGP-WPMP during the height of construction and fabrication.

sentence: In 2018, we provided more than $6 billion in loans for affordable housing projects in the U.S.
paraphrased: For affordable housing developments in the United States in 2018, we offered loans totaling more than $6 billion.

sentence: All of our final assembly sites now use these safer cleaners.
paraphrased: These safer cleansers are now used at all of our final assembly locations.

sentence: Through this involvement, we have recently signed on to the REBA Commercial Real Estate Principles.
paraphrased: We just endorsed the REBA Commercial Real Estate Principles as a result of this involvement.

sentence: To date, more than 400 individuals representing more than 140 pack houses have received training.
paraphrased: More than 400 people, representing more than 140 pack households, have trained so far.

sentence: Some involve claims for substantial amounts of money and/or claims for punitive damages.
paraphrased: Some of them entail claims for large financial compensation and/or punitive damages.

sentence: ChevronTexaco employees and their families receive high-quality, comprehensive health care.
paraphrased: Health care for ChevronTexaco personnel and their families is of the highest caliber.

sentence: Promote the use o f sustainability metrics in industry sourcing .
paraphrased: Encourage the use of sustainability metrics in procurement for industry.

sentence: We also operate our plants efficiently using captured waste heat.
paraphrased: We utilize captured waste heat to efficiently run our facilities.

sentence: To achieve this , we donate our time, tickets , funds , and , most importantly, our LUV.
paraphrased: We give our time, tickets, money, and most importantly, our LUV to accomplish this.

sentence: We have reset our waste diversion target to 60% by 2025.
paraphrased: Our new trash diversion goal for 2025 is 60%.

sentence: We focus on minimizing the impact our water use has on regions where we operate.
paraphrased: Our main goal is to have as little of an impact as possible on the areas in which we operate.

sentence: Due to monitoring and enhanced resident education, our waste diversion rate reached 13% in 2020.
paraphrased: Our garbage diversion rate increased to 13% in 2020 as a result of monitoring and better resident education.

sentence: In 2001-02, SBC made at least $1,480,645.00 in political contributions.
paraphrased: SBC donated at least $1,480,645.00 to politics in 2001-02.

sentence: We invest in, develop and use advanced technology to help safeguard information.
paraphrased: We make investments in cutting-edge technology and work to develop and implement it.

sentence: A primary focus is supporting capacity building for diverse businesses.
paraphrased: Supporting the capacity-building of varied businesses is a main priority.

sentence: General Mills is also working to build a safer global food system.
paraphrased: The creation of a more secure global food chain is another goal of General Mills.

sentence: Community engagement and partnership is a core Arista value.
paraphrased: Partnering with the community is a fundamental Arista value.

sentence: An independent third party operates the Action Line to ensure confidentiality.
paraphrased: The Action Line is run by a separate third party to maintain privacy.
